key_risks: Class-action lawsuit alleging hair loss and scalp injuries from products

Social media complaints eroding consumer and investor confidence

social_issues: Consumer trust issues due to product safety allegations
Reliance on professional stylists and salons for credibility and sales
governance_issues: Leadership changes, including CEO departure, signaling internal challenges
